title: 1.0 SINGUP
subtitle: Singup a new user
content: Signup new user with name: sergey, email: sergey@net

title: 1.1 LOGIN
subtitle: Sign in the existing user
content: Login user with name: sergey, email: sergey@net. Continue on card #6

title: 2. NEW USER HAS NO PROJECTS
subtitle: New user has empty project list
content: Click round button with 'plus' icon to add new project

title: 3. NEW PROJECT CREATED
subtitle: New project has been created
content: User has been create new project

title: 4. LIST WITH NEW PROJECT
subtitle: Project list with new user project
content: Click on row with project title and 'pen' icon to edit project information or click round button with 'plus' to add new project

title: 5. PROJECT HAS BEEN UPDATED
subtitle: Updated project information has been saved
content: Updated project title and description has been saved. Click round button with 'plus' to add new task in project

title: 6. LIST WITH UPDATED PROJECT
subtitle: User project list with updated project
content: Click on row with project title and 'pen' to edit project information or click round button with 'plus' to add new project

title: 8. MANAGE PROJECT TASKS
subtitle: Project add/edit tasks
content: Click on row with task title and 'pen' icon to edit/delete task information or click round button with 'plus' to add new task

title: 9. EDIT TASK
subtitle: Edit task information
content: Add new task title and description and set the task is completed

title: 11. DELETE TASK
subtitle: Confirm deleting selected task
content: To confirm task deleting click 'DELETE' button

title: 12. TASK HAS BEEN DELETED
subtitle: Selected task has been deleted
content: Green snackbar inform user that task has been deleted. The snackbar disappear automatically

title: 13. DELETE PROJECT
subtitle: Confirm deleting selected project
content: To confirm project deleting click 'DELETE' button

title: 14. PROJECT HAS BEEN DELETED
subtitle: Selected project has been deleted
content: Green snackbar inform user that project has been deleted. The snackbar disappear automatically. App return to card #2
